Actions.Text: --------------------------------------------------------# Auth: Christopher Stone# dCre: 2021/11/13 14:46# dMod: 2021/11/13 14:46 # Appl: Path Finder, System Events# Task: Open the Global Path Finder Menu.# Libs: None# Osax: None# Tags: @Applescript, @Script, @Path_Finder, @System_Events, @Open, @Path_Finder, @Menu--------------------------------------------------------	tell application "System Events"		tell application process "Path Finder"			tell menu bar 2				tell menu bar item 1					perform action "AXPress"				end tell			end tell		end tell	end tell--------------------------------------------------------
